title: China’s astronauts complete cave training amid preparations for moon missions
description:
China’s astronaut corps has completed a near month-long underground cave training, conducted in part to prepare for future crewed lunar landing missions.

The post China’s astronauts complete cave training amid preparations for moon missions appeared first on SpaceNews.
